ComicInfo.Title: Cracked Interviews the Super Salesman King; The Cracked Guide to Hockey; More Combined Movies; Postcard Collecting; One Day in the Desert; Three Hours of the Condor; Cracked Exposes Detroit; What Today's Programs Would Look Like If They Appeared in 2001 A.D.; Fill-in-the-Blank Form Letters and Cards for Every Occasion; Boretta
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs encounter Dracula.
A man wandering in the desert begs for food. Finding a sandwich, he begs for mustard.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:39:56. [Issue ID 250493]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Charlie Rodrigues,Bill Ward,John Severin,Su Gumen,Vic Martin
ComicInfo.Inker: Charlie Rodrigues,Bill Ward,John Severin,Su Gumen,Vic Martin
